title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Scaling Amazon Redshift with a multi-warehouse architecture (ANT318)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用多仓库架构扩展 Amazon Redshift (ANT318)
abstract: Enterprise analytics platforms are undergoing a major transformation—from centralized, overloaded data warehouses to federated, governed, GenAI-ready multi-warehouse architectures. In this session, you’ll learn how to design your data warehouse architecture to scale with your business needs. We’ll explore the end-to-end architectural evolution from a monolithic Redshift cluster to a modern multi-warehouse architecture and the best practices to deploy them in a cost-effective manner.
abstract_cn: 企业分析平台正在经历重大转型——从集中式、超负荷的数据仓库转向联邦式、受治理的、支持生成式AI的多仓库架构。在本次会议中，您将学习如何设计数据仓库架构以适应业务需求的扩展。我们将探讨从单体Redshift集群到现代多仓库架构的端到端架构演进，以及以经济高效的方式部署它们的最佳实践。
